text: Lito Legaspi (10 September 1941 - 8 September 2019) was a Filipino actor. He won Gawad Urian Award for Best Supporting Actor in Sinong Kapiling? Sinong Kasiping? (1977). He was probably best known for playing President of the Philippines Rodrigo Duterte in 1992 movie Pugoy Hostage: Davao. He was born in Manila.
